text: Eugène Parlier (13 February 1929 – 30 October 2017) was a Swiss football goalkeeper who played for Switzerland in the 1954 FIFA World Cup.Copa do Mundo da FIFA Suíça 1954 He was born in Montreux, Switzerland. He also played for Neuchâtel Xamax, Servette FC, Urania Genève Sport, FC Biel-Bienne, FC Lausanne-Sport, and Étoile Carouge FC. Parlier died on 30 October 2017 at the age of 88.Eugène Parlier est décédé ==References== ==Other websites== *FIFA profile Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Swiss footballers Category:1954 FIFA World Cup players Category:Sportspeople from Vaud
title: Eugène Parlier
